summary: Email Templates feature fully tested. All 34 tests passed (21 backend pytest + 13 frontend Playwright). Features verified: 1) GET /api/email-templates returns list with auto-created default template, 2) POST /api/email-templates creates new templates with variables, 3) PUT /api/email-templates/{id} updates template name/subject/html_content, 4) DELETE /api/email-templates/{id} deletes template (blocks deletion of only default), 5) POST /api/email-templates/{id}/duplicate creates copy with '(copia)' suffix, 6) POST /api/email-templates/preview replaces variables with sample data, 7) Frontend navigation to email templates page, 8) Template editor with HTML content, 9) Preview tab with rendered sample data, 10) Variable badges visible and clickable, 11) Default switch toggle, 12) Duplicate and delete confirmation dialogs.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user (test@orviti.com) and auto-created default email template. Test templates created during tests are cleaned up via afterEach fixtures.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Email Templates module fully tested and working. Key data-testids: email-templates-page, email-templates-loading, new-template-btn, template-card-{id}, save-template-btn, template-name-input, default-switch, subject-input, html-editor. Navigation: /email-templates route with nav-email-templates sidebar item. API endpoints all working: GET/POST /api/email-templates, GET/PUT/DELETE /api/email-templates/{id}, POST /api/email-templates/{id}/duplicate, POST /api/email-templates/preview.

features_verified.email_templates_list: PASS - GET /api/email-templates returns list with auto-created default template
features_verified.create_template: PASS - POST /api/email-templates creates new template with variables
features_verified.update_template: PASS - PUT /api/email-templates/{id} updates name, subject, html_content
features_verified.delete_template: PASS - DELETE /api/email-templates/{id} works, blocks deletion of only default
features_verified.duplicate_template: PASS - POST /api/email-templates/{id}/duplicate creates copy with '(copia)' suffix
features_verified.preview_template: PASS - POST /api/email-templates/preview replaces variables with sample data (Juan PÃ©rez, Curso de Ejemplo, etc.)
features_verified.frontend_page_load: PASS - Email templates page loads and displays template list
features_verified.frontend_editor: PASS - HTML editor shows content and allows editing when in edit mode
features_verified.frontend_preview: PASS - Preview tab renders email with sample data
features_verified.frontend_variables: PASS - Variable badges ({{recipient_name}}, {{course_name}}, etc.) are visible and clickable
features_verified.frontend_default_switch: PASS - Default template switch toggles correctly
features_verified.frontend_crud_dialogs: PASS - Create, duplicate, and delete confirmation dialogs work correctly
